text: Viljo Viklund (1 May 1903 - 17 March 1971) was a Finnish swimmer. He competed in the men's 200 metre breaststroke event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Finnish male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Finland Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Tampere Category:Male breaststroke swimmers
title: Viljo Viklund
